plot: A poignant and introspective look inside the mind of a woman being psychologically traumatized by a secret admirer. A pensive thriller, Quietus delves into the murky darkness of lust and infatuation.
title: Quietus
plot_es: A poignant and introspective look inside the mind of a woman being psychologically traumatized by a secret admirer. A pensive thriller, Quietus delves into the murky darkness of lust and infatuation.
plot_en: A poignant and introspective look inside the mind of a woman being psychologically traumatized by a secret admirer. A pensive thriller, Quietus delves into the murky darkness of lust and infatuation.
